markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cat Nap](/Feats.aspx?ID=2314) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can briefly sleep to regain your energy quickly. Once per hour, by sleeping for 10 minutes, you can gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 10 minutes.

<title level="2">Cat Nap leads to...</title>
[Focused Cat Nap](/Feats.aspx?ID=2318)
name: Cat Nap
